name: Numix - Dropbox Tray Icons

screenshots.caption: A preview of the icons, which are contained by the "Numix - Dropbox Tray Icons" icon set

short_description:
"Numix - Dropbox Tray Icons" is a icon set for the Linux GNOME-shell, whose purpose is to be used as tray icons for the cloud storage client "Dropbox". The icon pack ships with different icons, that visualize all possible states, the application may be in. It contains a default icon, a icon, that indicates when snychronization is in progress and a icon, that is used when an error occured during synchronization.

This icon set has been created to be used together with the GTK-theme "Numix" and has been designed to optically fit into the appearance of the "Numix"-theme and the accompanying "Numix-uTouch"-icon theme.
summary: A GNOME icon set, which contains tray icons for "Dropbox"
